ee.adit.service
Class MessageService

java.lang.Object
  ee.adit.service.MessageService

public class MessageService
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods for retrieving messages from Spring MessageSource.

Author:
Marko Kurm, Microlink Eesti AS, marko.kurm@microlink.ee, Jaak Lember, Interinx, jaak@interinx.com

Method Detail

getMessages

public java.util.List<Message> getMessages(java.lang.String messageCode,
                                           java.lang.Object[] parameters)
Retrieves messages for the specified code.

Parameters:
messageCode - message code
parameters - parameters for creating the messages
Returns:
List of Message objects for given message code. Contains same message in different UI languages.

getMessage

public java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String code,
                                   java.lang.Object[] parameters,
                                   java.util.Locale locale)
Retrieves messages for the specified locale.

Parameters:
code - message code
parameters - message parameters
locale - message locale
Returns:
Message as text

getMessages

public java.util.List<Message> getMessages(AditCodedException e)
Retrieves messages for the specified AditCodedException.

Parameters:
e - exception
Returns:
List of Message objects for given exception. Contains same message in different UI languages.
